citation: Proclamation under the Terrorism (Preventative Detention) Act 2005 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Terrorism (Preventative Detention) Act 2005

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Terrorism (Preventative Detention) Act 2005 fix 1 March 2007 as the day on which that Act commences.

19 February 2007

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

STEVEN KONS

Minister for Justice and Workplace Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 February 2007

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
